title: Understanding Financial Markets
description: A comprehensive exploration of how financial markets operate, including stock markets, bond markets, and other investment markets, with practical guidance for participating as an individual investor.
learning_objectives: Analyze how different financial markets operate and facilitate trading
Evaluate the roles of various market participants and intermediaries
Compare different types of orders and trading strategies for investors
Calculate trading costs and understand how they impact investment returns
Execute trades effectively using modern brokerage platforms and tools

skill_builder.title: Market Trading Simulator
skill_builder.description: An interactive platform where students learn to place different order types, read stock quotes, understand market dynamics, and practice trading mechanics in a risk-free environment.
